welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bodrum, Turkey! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant nightlife. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Bodrum has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pi Cafe Bistro
restaurants.description: Pi Cafe Bistro is a bistro located in Bodrum.

restaurants.name: Eleos Bodrum
restaurants.description: Eleos Bodrum is a seafood restaurant located in Bodrum.

restaurants.name: Bitez Kuru Fasulye
restaurants.description: Bitez Kuru Fasulye is a turkish home cooking restaurant located in Bitez.

restaurants.description: Mu Art Cafe Plaj is a restaurant located in Ortakent / Bodrum.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Imsik Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Imsik Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: Serves all domestic flights within Turkey.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kos Island International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kalymnos Island Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Kalymnos Island Airport provides exclusive services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
